```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(huxtable)
```


See @tbl:jj for more.

```{r tbl:jj, echo = TRUE}
ht <- hux(
        Employee = c('John Smith', 'Jane Doe', 'David Hugh-Jones'),
        Salary = c(50000, 50000, 40000),
        add_colnames = TRUE
      )

caption(ht)            <- "My Caption"
bold(ht)[1,]           <- TRUE
bottom_border(ht)[1,]  <- 0.4
align(ht)[,2]          <- 'right'
right_padding(ht)      <- 10
left_padding(ht)       <- 10
width(ht)              <- 0.35
number_format(ht)      <- 2


ht

```
